price: (yaitu) buatlah baju besi yang besar-besar dan ukurlah anyamannya; dan kerjakanlah amalan yang saleh.  Sesungguhnya Aku melihat apa yang kamu kerjakan.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
